assessment.title: Quality assessment
assessment.description: Please, assess the audio and video quality

video.title: Video
video.notInSync: Audio and video were not synchronized

forDevelopers.title: Get the code and start building
forDevelopers.description: Visit GitHub to access the SDKs to start building and customizing video conferencing in your application. Set up your server, deploy the code and configure your video application.

forNotDevelopers.title: Get a custom video solution for your business
forNotDevelopers.description: Donâ€™t have the time or resources to build your app? Get in touch - our team of Voximplant experts can help! We can write custom code and create a video solution to meet your exact business needs.

layout.description: You can change the video layout and settings during a call. The layout changes in real time.

grid.name: Grid
grid.description: All participants' video frames are the same size.

tribune.name: Tribune
tribune.description: Up to 4 participants' frames are bigger than the rest of the participants

demonstration.name: Demonstration
demonstration.description: One participant's frame is full screen, other participants are hidden

invitePeople.title: Invite participants
invitePeople.description: Share the meeting link to invite new participants
invitePeople.call: Or provide the phone number and the PIN code to join
invitePeople.email: Or send an invite to email

sharingButtons.withVideoAndAudio: Share your screen with audio and camera

chat.placeholder: Type message here... Shift+Enter to send
chat.privateDescription: Only you can see this message

fileInput.title: Attach files
fileInput.maxSize: Max file size is X MB

browserPermission.title: Allow access to your camera and microphone'
browserPermission.description: Click Allow or Accept on the permission popup to grant access to your camera and microphone.
browserPermission.popUpDescription: Allow access to your camera and microphone. Click on the camera and microphone icons in your browser bar. If your camera and a microphone didn't run automatically, try to refresh the page

noCamera.title: Allow access to your camera
noCamera.description: Allow access to your camera or join the conference in audio mode.

abortError.title: Cannot access your devices
abortError.description: Check if your devices are used in other applications or try to reload the page.'
